name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the anomaly was generated.

name: Metric
description: The type of anomaly detected (e.g., STATISTICAL_OUTLIER, NO_DATA_RECEIVED, UNKNOWN_VENDOR_ID).

name: severity
description: The severity of the anomaly (low, medium, or high).

name: vendor_id
description: The vendor ID associated with the anomalous event.

name: count
description: The record count within the one-minute window that triggered the anomaly.

name: score
description: The raw anomaly score from the model. For Isolation Forest, lower scores are more anomalous.

name: details
description: A JSON string containing additional context, such as real-time feature values and training baselines.
